column2: q1plot <- ggplot(metadata_with_hill, aes(x = Mangrove.system , y = q1, fill = Mangrove.system)) +
geom_text(data = q1_emmeans_df, aes(y = emmean, label = .group), vjust = -5,
color = "black", fontface = "bold", position = position_dodge(0.9)) +   labs(title = "Exp Shannon", y = NULL, x = NULL) + #,
